an3.124:1.1: “Yassam, bhikkhave, disayam bhikkhu bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti, manasi katumpi me esa, bhikkhave, disa na phasu hoti, pageva gantum.
an3.124:1.3: ‘addha te ayasmanto tayo dhamme pajahimsu, tayo dhamme bahulamakamsu.
an3.124:1.10: Yassam, bhikkhave, disayam bhikkhu bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti, manasi katumpi me esa, bhikkhave, disa na phasu hoti, pageva gantum.
an3.124:1.12: ‘addha te ayasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahimsu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamakamsu’.
an3.124:2.1: Yassam pana, bhikkhave, disayam bhikkhu samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharanti, gantumpi me esa, bhikkhave, disa phasu hoti, pageva manasi katum.
an3.124:2.3: ‘addha te ayasmanto tayo dhamme pajahimsu, tayo dhamme bahulamakamsu.
an3.124:2.10: Yassam, bhikkhave, disayam bhikkhu samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharanti, gantumpi me esa, bhikkhave, disa phasu hoti, pageva manasi katum.
an3.124:2.12: ‘addha te ayasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahimsu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamakamsu’”ti.
